opponent.label: Magma Grunt
opponent.description: A low-level peon of Team Magma, a gang in the Hoenn region who wish to expand the rule of human civilization. Loyal to the cause, she's here to win -- for Team Magma! And for herself!

epilogue.hint: Defeat the Magma Grunt with 5 or less layers

opponent.epilogue: Lunch with a Team Magma Grunt
